body_html:
Workarounds are currently possible, e.g. tensorflow_ros links against the pip binaries for C++.

The only limitation is that the current pip binaries are built with the old C++ ABI, while some OS (e.g. Ubuntu 16) build only with the new C++11 ABI. There's a pip bug report about that.
@asimshankar Is this going to be solved at some point ?
